entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher at Hogwarts. He is described as thinking fast and wanting to go to the South of France for some sun and sea.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the High Inquisitor who has been appointed by the Ministry of Magic. She is described as coldly looking at Hagrid and informing him that she will be inspecting her fellow teachers.

entities.name: minister
entities.description: The Minister is a high-ranking official in the Ministry of Magic who has been informed by Umbridge about Hagrid's late return.

relationships.description: Umbridge informs Hagrid that she will be informing the Minister of his late return.
Umbridge informs the Minister about Hagrid's late return.
Hagrid is being inspected by Umbridge as part of her duty as High Inquisitor.
